languageToPublish: Please select in which language(s) you wish to submit this record:
procedurName: 2. This is an ABS procedure for:
procedurNameInfo: Please provide a title for this specific ABS procedure (E.g.: Non-commercial use)
areaJurisdictionInfo: Jurisdiction where this ABS procedure is relevant
nameJurisdiction: 4. Where should applications for access be made?
nameJurisdictionInfo: Please provide relevant contacts or links.
requirements: 5. What are the conditions or requirements a potential user needs to fulfil to apply for access?
description: 6. Please provide a step-by step description or a visual representation of the ABS procedure
descriptionInfo: For example, you may wish to attach a flow chart or timeline.
hasApplicationDocuments: 7. Does the applicant need to provide any documents?
hasApplicationDocumentsInfo: Please provide information on application forms or required documents (e.g.: copy of applicant’s national passport)
applicationLinks: Please attach relevant application form/documents or provide a link to website
applicationLinksInfo: Please provide information on whom the application should be sent to:
hasApplicationFeesInfo: Please provide any additional information on application fees
duration: 9. How long does the application process take:
relevantInformationInfo: Please use this field to provide any other relevant information that may not have been addressed elsewhere in the record.
relevantDocumentsInfo: Other relevant website addresses and/or attached documents
notesInfo: The “Notes” field is for personal reference and can be seen only when the record is being edited. It will be hidden once the record is published. This field is not meant to be used for confidential information.
